script.name: wwsl.T2.nav.move
script.sourceplaintext:
$gLogFN=596
$Dummy=get global variable: name='wwsl.T2.global' $Dummy=$Dummy[4] $Debug=1 & $Dummy do if $Debug @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=': Start navigation to %s' arg2=$Target $FollowTimeout=60000
$gResult=[FALSE] if$Target -> is of class Сектор do if [SECTOR] == $Target return [TRUE] $Target.Sector=$Target gosub MoveToTargetSector else do if [DOCKEDAT] gosub refuel skip if$Target -> exists return $gResult $Dummy=[THIS] -> get owner race $Dummy2=$Target -> get owner race $Target.IsSameOwner=$Dummy == $Dummy2 $Target.IsAShip=$Target -> is of class Подвижный корабль * ------------------------------------------------ * If the target is docked (means the target is a ship) * TODO: Required processing of the docked targets $Dummy=$Target -> get environment skip ifis datatype[ $Dummy ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR return $gResult * ------------------------------------------------ do if [DOCKEDAT] == $Target return [TRUE] [THIS] ->set destination to $Target $Target.Sector=$Target -> get sector if[SECTOR] == $Target.Sector gosub MoveToTarget else gosub MoveToTargetSector end end return $gResult
MoveToTargetSector: @ $EC.Reserved=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function0 : #Fn=504 if not$EC.Reserved gosub MoveToNextSector endsub end * Prepare data for searching --------------------------- $validator=63 $EC=Батареи $tmp=get max price of ware $EC @ $EC.WareStruct=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=506 arg1='WareStruct' $EC.WareStruct[1] = $EC $EC.WareStruct[2] = $tmp @ $EC.WorkspaceStruct=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=506 arg1='WorkspaceStruct' $EC.WorkspaceStruct[2] = 0 * ------------------------------------------------------------- $EC.OnBoard=[THIS] -> get true amount of ware $EC in cargo bay $EC.Req=[THIS] -> needed jump drive energy for jump to sector $Target.Sector if$EC.OnBoard >= $EC.Req gosub JumpToTarget endsub end gosub GetRefuelSector if$Sector == null * No refuel on route? Just jump as far as possible. * It will work in this version. gosub JumpToTarget endsub end if$Sector != [SECTOR] gosub GetBestRefuelGate if$Gate $Target=$Gate * Again: we cannot ignore orbital accelerators * Should use our smart jumping procedure. gosub JumpToTarget else * No gate? It's strange. Just move. gosub MoveToNextSector end * We can be in refuel sector or not. * No guaranties. Just return on this. endsub end * Don't refuel if has no free space $EC.CanLoad=[THIS] -> get free amount of ware $EC in cargo bay $tmp=[THIS] -> needed jump drive energy for jump to sector [SECTOR] if$EC.CanLoad < 2 * $tmp gosub MoveToNextSector endsub end * We in refueling sector. Dock with nearest refueling dept. $EC.WorkspaceStruct[1] = [SECTOR] @ $Dummy1=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function4 : #Fn=611 arg1=$validator arg2=$EC.WorkspaceStruct arg3=$EC.WareStruct arg4=$tmp $Dummy.Index=size of array $Dummy1 $Dummy.Sort=array alloc: size=$Dummy.Index while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $Dummy=$Dummy1[$Dummy.Index] $Dummy.Dist=get distance between [THIS] and $Dummy @ $Dummy.Dist=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.util.formatNumber : Number=$Dummy.Dist Decimals=10 $Dummy.Sort[$Dummy.Index] = $Dummy.Dist end ifsize of array $Dummy1 $Dummy=sort array: data=$Dummy1 sort values=$Dummy.Sort $Dummy=$Dummy[0] do if $Debug @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=591 arg1=': Move to refuel %s' arg2=$Dummy @ =[THIS] -> fly to station $Dummy endsub end gosub MoveToNextSector endsub
* In: $Target.Sector, $EC.OnBoard * Out: $Sector|null GetRefuelSector: gosub GetRefuelSectors $Sector=null $Dummy.Index=size of array $Sectors while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $Dummy.Sector=$Sectors[$Dummy.Index] $EC.Req=0 skip if$Dummy.Sector == [SECTOR] $EC.Req=[THIS] -> needed jump drive energy for jump to sector $Dummy.Sector if$EC.OnBoard >= $EC.Req $Sector=$Dummy.Sector break end end do if $Debug AND $Sector @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=591 arg1=': Sector to refuel: %s' arg2=$Sector do if $Debug AND $Sector == null @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=591 arg1=': Sector to refuel not found' endsub
* In: $Target JumpToTarget: @ $tmp=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=517 arg1=$Target arg2=1 if$tmp $Dummy=[THIS] -> use jump drive: target=$tmp $Dummy2=$tmp -> get sector @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function4 : #Fn=$gLogFN arg1=39001 arg2=$tmp arg3=$Dummy2 arg4=$Dummy * X3AP: We cannot jump and forget of orbital accelerator anymore * This call will return FLRET_ERROR and we will stuck forever. * We should try to jump to all gates on route until success. * Or fly to next sector as usual on failure. do if $Dummy == FLRET_WARPED endsub else @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=591 arg1=': Gate to jump to %s not found' arg2=$Target end @ $Dummy.Gates=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=500 arg1=$Target $Dummy.Index=size of array $Dummy.Gates while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $tmp=$Dummy.Gates[$Dummy.Index] $Dummy=[THIS] -> use jump drive: target=$tmp if$Debug $Dummy2=$tmp -> get sector @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function4 : #Fn=591 arg1=': Jump to %s (%s) with result %s' arg2=$tmp arg3=$Dummy2 arg4=$Dummy end do if $Dummy == FLRET_WARPED break end gosub MoveToNextSector endsub
MoveToNextSector: do if $Target.Sector == [SECTOR] endsub $tmp=get next sector on route from sector [SECTOR] to sector $Target.Sector do if $Debug @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=591 arg1=': Move to sector %s' arg2=$tmp do if $Target.IsAShip AND $Target.IsSameOwner [THIS] ->add to formation with leader $Target @ $Dummy=[THIS] -> fly to sector $tmp [THIS] ->remove from any formation do if $Debug @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=591 arg1=': Move to sector %s finished with %s' arg2=$Target.Sector arg3=$Dummy endsub
MoveToTarget: $Dummy=null ifis datatype[ $Precision ] == DATATYPE_INT $Dummy=$Target if$Target -> is of class Корабль $Dummy2=$Target -> get sector $Dummy=sprintf: fmt='%s (%s)', $Dummy, $Dummy2, null, null, null end $msg=sprintf: fmt='Move to %s with prec. %s m.', $Dummy, $Precision, null, null, null do if $Debug @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=591 arg1=': %s' arg2=$msg do if $Target.IsAShip AND $Target.IsSameOwner [THIS] ->add to formation with leader $Target [THIS] ->set follow mode [TRUE] @ $Dummy=[THIS] -> follow $Target with precision $Precision m : timeout=$FollowTimeout ms [THIS] ->remove from any formation do if $Dummy == FLRET_TARGETREACHED $gResult=[TRUE] else $msg=sprintf: fmt='Move to %s', $Target, null, null, null, null do if $Debug @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=591 arg1=': %s' arg2=$msg if$Target -> is of class Врата $Dummy.Sector=$Target get gate destination: return sector=[TRUE] @ $Dummy=[THIS] -> fly to sector $Dummy.Sector do if [SECTOR] == $Dummy.Sector $gResult=[TRUE] else @ $Dummy=[THIS] -> fly to station $Target do if $Dummy == FLRET_INVALIDPARMS OR $Dummy == FLRET_ERROR @ =wait randomly from 10000 to 30000 ms do if [DOCKEDAT] == $Target $gResult=[TRUE] end end do if $Debug @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function3 : #Fn=591 arg1=': %s: %s' arg2=$msg arg3=$Dummy endsub
* In: none * Out: none refuel: @ $tmp=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function0 : #Fn=505 if not$tmp do if $Debug @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=591 arg1=': Refueling not needed' endsub end if[DOCKEDAT] -> can sell ware $EC $tLoaded=[THIS] -> buy $tmp units of $EC do if $Debug @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=591 arg1=': Refueled x%s pcs.' arg2=$tLoaded endsub end skip if[DOCKEDAT] -> get amount of ware $EC in cargo bay endsub $tShipRace=[THIS] -> get owner race $tDockRace=[DOCKEDAT] -> get owner race skip if$tShipRace == $tDockRace endsub $tPrice=[DOCKEDAT] -> get price of ware $EC $tLoaded=[THIS] -> load $tmp units of $EC do if $Debug @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function2 : #Fn=591 arg1=': Refueled x%s pcs.' arg2=$tLoaded $tPrice=$tPrice * $tLoaded [DOCKEDAT] ->add money: $tPrice $tPrice=0 - $tPrice if[HOMEBASE] [HOMEBASE] ->add money: $tPrice else add money to player: $tPrice end endsub * End of refuel
* Get all sectors to refuel enroute. * In: $Target.Sector * Out: $Sectors GetRefuelSectors: $Sectors=array alloc: size=0 $Dummy.Sector=[SECTOR] skip ifget next gate on route from $Dummy.Sector to $Target.Sector endsub while$Dummy.Sector != $Target.Sector $Dummy1=find station: product $EC with best price: max.price=null, amount=1, max.jumps=0, startsector=$Dummy.Sector, trader=[THIS], exclude array=null $Dummy2=find station sells: resource $EC with best price: max.price=null, amount=1, max.jumps=0, startsector=$Dummy.Sector, trader=[THIS], exclude array=null do if $Dummy1 OR $Dummy2 append $Dummy.Sector to array $Sectors $Dummy.Sector=get next sector on route from sector $Dummy.Sector to sector $Target.Sector end endsub
* Get best gate 2 refuel in specified sector. * In: $Sector, $validator, EC.WorkspaceStruct, $EC.WareStruct, $EC * Out: $Gate|null GetBestRefuelGate: $EC.WorkspaceStruct[1] = $Sector @ $tStations=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function4 : #Fn=611 arg1=$validator arg2=$EC.WorkspaceStruct arg3=$EC.WareStruct arg4=null $tData=array alloc: size=0 $tSort=array alloc: size=0 $tIndex=size of array $tStations while$tIndex > 0 dec $tIndex= $tStation=$tStations[$tIndex] @ $tGate=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=517 arg1=$tStation skip if$tGate continue $tDist=get distance between $tStation and $tGate @ $tDist=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.util.formatNumber : Number=$tDist Decimals=10 $tDist=sprintf: fmt='%s from %s to %s', $tDist, $tStation, $tGate, null, null append $tGate to array $tData append $tDist to array $tSort end $tSortedData=sort array: data=$tData sort values=$tSort $Gate=null ifsize of array $tSortedData $Gate=$tSortedData[0] if$Debug $Dummy=sort array $tSort @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function4 : #Fn=590 arg1=': Gates to refuel' arg2=' %s => %s' arg3=$tSortedData arg4=$Dummy end else do if $Debug @ =[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=591 arg1=': No gates (stations) to refuel' end endsub
return null

comment.var: If the target is docked (means the target is a ship)
TODO: Required processing of the docked targets
Prepare data for searching ---------------------------

line.text: needed jump drive energy for jump to sector

comment.var: No refuel on route? Just jump as far as possible.
It will work in this version.
Again: we cannot ignore orbital accelerators
Should use our smart jumping procedure.
No gate? It's strange. Just move.
We can be in refuel sector or not.
No guaranties. Just return on this.
Don't refuel if has no free space

line.text: needed jump drive energy for jump to sector

comment.var: We in refueling sector. Dock with nearest refueling dept.
In: $Target.Sector, $EC.OnBoard
Out: $Sector|null

line.text: needed jump drive energy for jump to sector

comment.var: In: $Target
X3AP: We cannot jump and forget of orbital accelerator anymore
This call will return FLRET_ERROR and we will stuck forever.
We should try to jump to all gates on route until success.
Or fly to next sector as usual on failure.

line.var: ': Gate to jump to %s not found'

line.text: get next sector on route from sector

comment.var: In: none
Out: none
End of refuel
Get all sectors to refuel enroute.
In: $Target.Sector
Out: $Sectors

line.text: get next gate on route from
get next sector on route from sector

comment.var: Get best gate 2 refuel in specified sector.
In: $Sector, $validator, EC.WorkspaceStruct, $EC.WareStruct, $EC
Out: $Gate|null
